dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, you know, we always hear about the International Property Awards, like, this huge, prestigious thing for design, architecture...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, you know, we always hear about the International Property Awards, like, this huge, prestigious thing for design, architecture...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, A, absolutely. Over 25 years, showcasing the best, right? But uh, the recent ceremony on December 2nd at The Savoy… it was kinda different.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, A, absolutely. Over twenty five years, showcasing the best, right? But uh, the recent ceremony on December second at The Savoy... it was kinda different.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Different how? I thought it was always this big, glamorous gala.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Different how? I thought it was always this big, glamorous gala.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it wasn't. Like, apparently it was unexpectedly quiet. Kinda somber, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it wasn't. Like, apparently it was unexpectedly quiet. Kinda somber, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Huh, that's odd. And I hear the entry numbers were kinda low too? Only 1900 entries?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh, that's odd. And I hear the entry numbers were kinda low too? Only nineteen hundred entries?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, from just 114 countries. And get this, the judging panel had, like, 80 experts, but also four UK Lords.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, from just one hundred fourteen countries. And get this, the judging panel had, like, eighty experts, but also four U K Lords.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Four Lords? I thought they always claimed unbiased judging?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Four Lords? I thought they always claimed unbiased judging?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And then, Stuart Shield, the president, was there presenting, but also listed as "unfortunately unavailable" in some reports. It's… confusing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And then, Stuart Shield, the president, was there presenting, but also listed as unfortunately unavailable in some reports. It's... confusing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards were presented by Lord Thurso, Chairman of the awards judging panel and Mr. Stuart Shield, president, International Property Awards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Super confusing. And isn't there, uh, some controversy around their logo?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super confusing. And isn't there, uh, some controversy around their logo?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, big time. It's apparently a symbol of controversy, and some even say attaining one of these awards can actually be a disadvantage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, big time. It's apparently a symbol of controversy, and some even say attaining one of these awards can actually be a disadvantage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories. Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A disadvantage? What, so you win and it hurts your business? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A disadvantage? What, so you win and it hurts your business? That's wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And then, despite all these categories, 48 of them, they didn't even *stage* any regional heats this year. For, like, Africa, Europe, the US...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And then, despite all these categories, forty eight of them, they didn't even stage any regional heats this year. For, like, Africa, Europe, the U S...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA. These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, what are we even talking about here then? A "prestigious award" that's quiet, has low entries, a weird judging panel, a controversial logo, *and* skips regional events?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what are we even talking about here then? A prestigious award that's quiet, has low entries, a weird judging panel, a controversial logo, and skips regional events?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Yeah, it kinda makes you wonder, doesn't it? For something that's supposed to be such a large program of honors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it kinda makes you wonder, doesn't it? For something that's supposed to be such a large program of honors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards are the worlds largest and most wide-ranging programme of honours within the property industry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Maybe it's time for, like, a re-evaluation of its actual value.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Maybe it's time for, like, a re-evaluation of its actual value.
